law.catch_line: If registration plates issued for a vehicle registered under this part have never been used, the own...
law.text:
If registration plates issued for a vehicle registered under this part have never been used, the owner of the vehicle for which the plates were issued is entitled to a refund of the Maryland registration fee paid less an administrative fee established by the Administration if, during the registration year for which the registration plates were issued, the owner:
Applies to the Administration for a refund; and
Surrenders to the Administration:
The registration card issued for the vehicle; and
The unused registration plates.
